# healthR 

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a working package to assist in studying health data. It's designed as a package, and should be useful as a template to build a web app for analyzing personal health data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of heathR 

``` r
devtools::load_all(".")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(healthR)
## basic example code
```
